sentences.english: He is enamoured by that enchantress.
Angel or siren, rhythm, fragrance, light.
sentences.chinese: 天使或妖婦，韻律，芳香，光線。

sentences.english: She stood before the man as a temptress.
sentences.chinese: 她站在那個男人面前，像個妖婦。

sentences.english: The beauty of the music produced by the Sirens of ancient Greek legend drew unwary sailors to their doom on the rocks.
sentences.chinese: 古希臘的妖婦用優美的歌聲勾引水手觸礁而死。

sentences.english: Soon campaign soon peerless, have no necessity to that kind of the cursed woman show leniency.
sentences.chinese: 速戰速絕，沒必要對那種妖婦手下留情。
